News.Title: Elgi Rubber Company: Q3 FY25 Loss Widens to ₹3.5 Crore, Revenue Dips
News.Summary: Elgi Rubber Company reported Q3 FY25 results with a loss of ₹3.5 crore, up 82.29% YoY. Revenue decreased by 3.41% YoY to ₹91.48 crore. Operating income improved significantly QoQ and YoY despite overall losses. EPS declined to ₹-0.71, down 86.84% YoY.

News.Title: ELGI RUBBER CO Reports Significant Improvement in Q3 EBITDA
News.Summary: ELGI RUBBER CO has reported a substantial increase in its Q3 EBITDA, which rose to 102 million rupees from 45 million rupees in the same quarter last year. The company's EBITDA margin also showed significant improvement, increasing to 11.13% from 4.77% year-over-year.

News.Title: ELGI RUBBER CO Reports Q3 Financial Results
News.Summary: ELGI RUBBER CO has reported its Q3 financial results. The company's consolidated net loss increased to 35 million rupees, compared to a loss of 19.2 million rupees in the same quarter last year. Revenue for the quarter decreased to 914.7 million rupees from 947 million rupees year-over-year.
